column5: This guest room features a bed, two nightstands, a small couch, and lamp desk. There is plenty of space to store your clothes. We have high-speed Wifi (100Mbps).  Luisa and I both work from home and our offices are located on the second floor as well. Our dog Jacoby is very friendly and social.  HEB grocery store, bus station and restaurants are within walking distance.  Airport: 15 min travel time. Downtown San Antonio: 25 min travel time. McAllister Park: 5 min travel time.
column8: Cozy Room with fast Wifi only 15 min from Airport
